overview:
Israel Kehat is a technology mentor and entrepreneur. Based in Israel, he has been active in many other regions, from the USA and Europe to Latin America, Eastern Europe and India. Israel has provided consulting to market leaders such as Microsoft, Intel and IBM, as well as mid-size and startup companies.

In recent years Israel has focused on establishing his own ventures, from technology human resources to classic startups Actus (broadcast media monitoring) and Dialop (discussion management).

Israel has a wide range of skills. He has trained thousands of software engineers and participated in various large-form events. His consulting practice, spanning more than a decade, including most industries including games, education, defense, communication, mobile, IT, insurance, banking, media, broadcast, semiconductors, development tools, travel, and others.
